code:
Simple linear state progression (walk → run → sprint)

States: A, B, C, D
Initial state: A

Transitions:
  - walk: A → B
  - run: B → C
  - sprint: C → D
dot:
digraph simple_linear_fsm {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=simple_linear_fsm rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	A [label="A\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	B [label="B\l"]
	C [label="C\l"]
	D [label="D\l"]
	A -> B [label=walk]
	B -> C [label=run]
	C -> D [label=sprint]
}
description: Simple linear state progression (walk → run → sprint)

code:
State machine with conditional transitions (sprint requires is_fast condition)

States: A, B, C, D
Initial state: A

Transitions:
  - walk: A → B
  - run: B → C
  - sprint: C → D [condition: is_fast]
  - sprint: C → B
dot:
digraph conditional_transitions {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=conditional_transitions rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	A [label="A\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	B [label="B\l"]
	C [label="C\l"]
	D [label="D\l"]
	A -> B [label=walk]
	B -> C [label=run]
	C -> D [label=sprint]
	C -> B [label=sprint]
}
description: State machine with conditional transitions (sprint requires is_fast condition)

code:
Multiple transition targets from single state (B → A, C, F)

States: A, B, C, D, E, F
Initial state: A

Transitions:
  - to_state_A: B → A
  - to_state_C: B → C
  - to_state_F: B → F
  - to_C: A → C
  - to_E: C → E
  - to_B: E → B
dot:
digraph roi_multiple_targets {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=roi_multiple_targets rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	A [label="A\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	B [label="B\l"]
	C [label="C\l"]
	D [label="D\l"]
	E [label="E\l"]
	F [label="F\l"]
	B -> A [label=to_state_A]
	B -> C [label=to_state_C]
	B -> F [label=to_state_F]
	A -> C [label=to_C]
	C -> E [label=to_E]
	E -> B [label=to_B]
}
description: Multiple transition targets from single state (B → A, C, F)

code:
State machine with self-loops and reset transitions

States: A, B, C
Initial state: A

Transitions:
  - reset: A → A
  - reset: B → A
  - reset: C → A
  - advance: A → B
  - advance: B → C
dot:
digraph loop_transitions {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=loop_transitions rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	A [label="A\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	B [label="B\l"]
	C [label="C\l"]
	A -> A [label=reset]
	A -> B [label=advance]
	B -> A [label=reset]
	B -> C [label=advance]
	C -> A [label=reset]
}
description: State machine with self-loops and reset transitions

code:
Bidirectional FSM with wildcard error transition

States: idle, active, paused, error
Initial state: idle

Transitions:
  - start: idle → active
  - pause: active → paused
  - resume: paused → active
  - stop: active → idle
  - stop: paused → idle
  - fail: * → error
  - recover: error → idle
dot:
digraph bidirectional_fsm {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=bidirectional_fsm rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	idle [label="idle\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	active [label="active\l"]
	paused [label="paused\l"]
	error [label="error\l"]
	idle -> active [label=start]
	idle -> error [label=fail]
	active -> paused [label=pause]
	active -> idle [label=stop]
	active -> error [label=fail]
	paused -> active [label=resume]
	paused -> idle [label=stop]
	paused -> error [label=fail]
	error -> error [label=fail]
	error -> idle [label=recover]
}
description: Bidirectional FSM with wildcard error transition

code:
Cyclic traffic light state machine

States: green, yellow, red
Initial state: green

Transitions:
  - next: green → yellow
  - next: yellow → red
  - next: red → green
dot:
digraph traffic_light_cycle {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=traffic_light_cycle rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	green [label="green\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	yellow [label="yellow\l"]
	red [label="red\l"]
	green -> yellow [label=next]
	yellow -> red [label=next]
	red -> green [label=next]
}

code:
Network connection lifecycle with reconnection logic

States: disconnected, connecting, connected, reconnecting, error
Initial state: disconnected

Transitions:
  - connect: disconnected → connecting
  - established: connecting → connected
  - disconnect: connected → disconnected
  - timeout: connecting → error
  - lost: connected → reconnecting
  - established: reconnecting → connected
  - timeout: reconnecting → disconnected
dot:
digraph network_connection {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=network_connection rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	disconnected [label="disconnected\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	connecting [label="connecting\l"]
	connected [label="connected\l"]
	reconnecting [label="reconnecting\l"]
	error [label="error\l"]
	disconnected -> connecting [label=connect]
	connecting -> connected [label=established]
	connecting -> error [label=timeout]
	reconnecting -> connected [label=established]
	reconnecting -> disconnected [label=timeout]
	connected -> disconnected [label=disconnect]
	connected -> reconnecting [label=lost]
}
description: Network connection lifecycle with reconnection logic

code:
Document approval and publishing workflow

States: draft, review, approved, published, archived
Initial state: draft

Transitions:
  - submit: draft → review
  - approve: review → approved
  - reject: review → draft
  - publish: approved → published
  - archive: published → archived
  - unarchive: archived → published
dot:
digraph document_workflow {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=document_workflow rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	draft [label="draft\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	review [label="review\l"]
	approved [label="approved\l"]
	published [label="published\l"]
	archived [label="archived\l"]
	draft -> review [label=submit]
	review -> approved [label=approve]
	review -> draft [label=reject]
	approved -> published [label=publish]
	published -> archived [label=archive]
	archived -> published [label=unarchive]
}

code:
Game character state machine with combat and movement

States: idle, walking, running, jumping, attacking, dead
Initial state: idle

Transitions:
  - move: idle → walking
  - sprint: walking → running
  - stop: walking → idle
  - stop: running → idle
  - jump: idle → jumping
  - jump: walking → jumping
  - jump: running → jumping
  - land: jumping → idle
  - attack: idle → attacking
  - attack: walking → attacking
  - finish_attack: attacking → idle
  - die: * → dead
dot:
digraph game_player_states {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=game_player_states rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	idle [label="idle\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	walking [label="walking\l"]
	running [label="running\l"]
	jumping [label="jumping\l"]
	attacking [label="attacking\l"]
	dead [label="dead\l"]
	idle -> walking [label=move]
	idle -> jumping [label=jump]
	idle -> attacking [label=attack]
	idle -> dead [label=die]
	walking -> running [label=sprint]
	walking -> idle [label=stop]
	walking -> jumping [label=jump]
	walking -> attacking [label=attack]
	walking -> dead [label=die]
	running -> idle [label=stop]
	running -> jumping [label=jump]
	running -> dead [label=die]
	jumping -> idle [label=land]
	jumping -> dead [label=die]
	attacking -> idle [label=finish_attack]
	attacking -> dead [label=die]
	dead -> dead [label=die]
}
description: Game character state machine with combat and movement

code:
Phone call state machine with hold functionality

States: idle, ringing, active, on_hold, ended
Initial state: idle

Transitions:
  - incoming_call: idle → ringing
  - answer: ringing → active
  - reject: ringing → ended
  - hold: active → on_hold
  - resume: on_hold → active
  - hangup: active → ended
  - hangup: on_hold → ended
  - reset: ended → idle
dot:
digraph phone_call_fsm {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=phone_call_fsm rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	idle [label="idle\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	ringing [label="ringing\l"]
	active [label="active\l"]
	on_hold [label="on_hold\l"]
	ended [label="ended\l"]
	idle -> ringing [label=incoming_call]
	ringing -> active [label=answer]
	ringing -> ended [label=reject]
	active -> on_hold [label=hold]
	active -> ended [label=hangup]
	on_hold -> active [label=resume]
	on_hold -> ended [label=hangup]
	ended -> idle [label=reset]
}
description: Phone call state machine with hold functionality

code:
E-commerce order processing workflow with cancellation and refunds

States: pending, confirmed, paid, shipped, delivered, cancelled, refunded
Initial state: pending

Transitions:
  - confirm: pending → confirmed
  - pay: confirmed → paid
  - ship: paid → shipped
  - deliver: shipped → delivered
  - cancel: pending → cancelled
  - cancel: confirmed → cancelled
  - refund: paid → refunded
  - refund: shipped → refunded
dot:
digraph order_processing {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=order_processing rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	pending [label="pending\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	confirmed [label="confirmed\l"]
	paid [label="paid\l"]
	shipped [label="shipped\l"]
	delivered [label="delivered\l"]
	cancelled [label="cancelled\l"]
	refunded [label="refunded\l"]
	pending -> confirmed [label=confirm]
	pending -> cancelled [label=cancel]
	confirmed -> paid [label=pay]
	confirmed -> cancelled [label=cancel]
	paid -> shipped [label=ship]
	paid -> refunded [label=refund]
	shipped -> delivered [label=deliver]
	shipped -> refunded [label=refund]
}
description: E-commerce order processing workflow with cancellation and refunds

code:
ATM withdrawal transaction flow with error handling

States: ready, card_inserted, pin_entered, menu, processing, dispensing, error
Initial state: ready

Transitions:
  - insert_card: ready → card_inserted
  - enter_pin: card_inserted → pin_entered
  - invalid_pin: card_inserted → error
  - pin_ok: pin_entered → menu
  - select_withdrawal: menu → processing
  - success: processing → dispensing
  - insufficient_funds: processing → error
  - take_cash: dispensing → ready
  - reset: error → ready
dot:
digraph atm_transaction {
	graph [color=black directed=true fillcolor=white label=atm_transaction rankdir=LR "strict"=false style=solid]
	node [color=black fillcolor=white peripheries=1 shape=rectangle style="rounded,filled"]
	edge [color=black]
	ready [label="ready\l" color=red fillcolor=darksalmon peripheries=2]
	card_inserted [label="card_inserted\l"]
	pin_entered [label="pin_entered\l"]
	menu [label="menu\l"]
	processing [label="processing\l"]
	dispensing [label="dispensing\l"]
	error [label="error\l"]
	ready -> card_inserted [label=insert_card]
	card_inserted -> pin_entered [label=enter_pin]
	card_inserted -> error [label=invalid_pin]
	pin_entered -> menu [label=pin_ok]
	menu -> processing [label=select_withdrawal]
	processing -> dispensing [label=success]
	processing -> error [label=insufficient_funds]
	dispensing -> ready [label=take_cash]
	error -> ready [label=reset]
}
description: ATM withdrawal transaction flow with error handling
